name: PAWTUCKET INSTITUTION FOR SAVINGS v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator
name_abbreviation: Pawtucket Institution for Savings v. Norberg

parties: PAWTUCKET INSTITUTION FOR SAVINGS v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.

attorneys: Ronald R. Gagnon, Pawtucket, for petitioner.
Perry Shatkin, State of RI Division of Taxation, Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Providence, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
PAWTUCKET INSTITUTION FOR SAVINGS v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator.
No. 83-256-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
June 3, 1983.
Ronald R. Gagnon, Pawtucket, for petitioner.
Perry Shatkin, State of RI Division of Taxation, Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Providence, for respondent.
